attributes.action: To give Govenment support for a Dinity at Work Act to deal with Bullying in the workplace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A Dignity at Work bill is required to enhance the working lives of every citizen and as a result provide better management for UK industry. It should be seen as a long term strategy to improve social justice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
